name: blocklist
description: Blocklist hook filters outgoing and incoming payments against a known list of scam accounts.

scripts.compile: ./node_modules/.bin/asc --disable=bulk-memory --runtime=stub blacklist.ts -O3 -o blacklist.wasm && hook-cleaner blacklist.wasm && ./node_modules/.bin/asc --disable=bulk-memory --runtime=stub blocklist.ts -O3 -o blocklist.wasm && hook-cleaner blocklist.wasm

author: Equilibrium - https://equilibrium.co
